data.text: @ItaOKelly Similarly to Dad, I agree that seeing celebs who "have it all" & are apparently managing to cope with a mental illness at the same time caused me to feel I needed to "cope" to show I was a success while my ED grew in severity.
@declantnaughton You put it well, the silent sufferers.

@ItaOKelly I agree that celebrities waving their mental illness as a badge of honour is not helpful. As a parent of an adult daughter with an eating disorder I am too aware of the lack of mental health supports. Mental health is the silent sufferer and services are shamefully inadequate
